title: Blood Red Throne - Affiliated With the Suffering (2003)
description:
This is Blood Red Throne.  In my opinion, they are the epitome of Death Metal.  With entirely brutal lyrics filled with vivid descriptions of gore, death, mutilation, sadism, murder, malice, evisceration, decapitation, devitalization, masturbation, and many more beautiful things; they reign supreme in the Death Metal genre, and prove to consistently set the bar (if not, align themselves with such gods as Cannibal Corpse), and give a new, yet old, meaning to the genre of Death Metal.  You must download, you must listen, you must seed.

Blood Red Throne

Affiliated With the Suffering - (2003)

1. Unleashing Hell
2. A Dream of Death
3. Bleeders Lament
4. Mandatory Homicide/Death Inc.
5. Razor Jack
6. Chaos Rising!
7. Gather the Dead
8. Affiliated With the Suffering
9. Malediction
10.Mercy Killings
11.Deadly Intentions


Personal Favorite Tracks:
-Mandatory Homicide/Death Inc.
-Gather the Dead
-Affiliated With the Suffering
